useCase.name: View and Add Note to Account
useCase.description: User views the account details and adds a note to it.

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and has access to the account.

successEndConditions.condition: Note successfully added to the account.

failureEndConditions.condition: Error occurred while adding the note to the account.

useCase.trigger: User clicks on the 'Add account note' button.

mainSequence.step: User clicks on the Header 'Add account note' button.
User navigates to the 'Add note' page.
User inputs data in the 'Add note' form.
User clicks on the 'Save Note' button.
Note is created and stored in the database.
The created note is returned to the user in JSON format.
